body {
  font-size: 1.1em;
}

img {
  max-height: 525px;

strong {
  color: #23373B;

}

.title-slide {

  background-size: 25%;
  background-position: 88% 70%;
}

.footnote {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 1em;
    padding-right: 4em;
    font-size: 70%;

.remark-slide-content {

}

.remark-code {
  font-size: 0.9em;

.left-column h3 {

.left-column h3:last-of-type{
  color: #000;
}

.right-column {
  padding-top: 0;
}

.hl {
  /* color: #d16666;
  color: #ff3e41; */
  color: #d14;
  font-weight: 400;
}
.hlb {
  /* color: #d16666;

}
.right-plot {
  width: 60%;

  /* border-left: solid 1px #272822; */

}

.huge {
  font-size: 2em;
}


.fullscreen {
  background-color: #FAFAFA;
  border-top: none;
  background-position: center;

}

  padding: 0px;
}

.plot-callout img {
  width: 100%;
  border: 4px solid #23373B;
}

.top-right {
  top: 10%;
  right: 5%;
}
